Title: Authorizing the assessor of the county of Nassau to accept from the Incorporated Village of Hempstead an application for exemption from real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the assessor of the county of Nassau to accept from the Incorporated Village of Hempstead an application for exemption from real property taxes for property owned by such village.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the assessor of the county of Nassau to accept from the Incorporated Village of Hempstead an application for exemption from real property taxes
